value.title: 5 AWESOME things about the new ribbon in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Power BI Desktop has a new ribbon! Patrick shows you 5 awesome things about it that you may not be aware of.  Guy in a Cube courses: https://guyinacu.be/courses  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook

value.title: Add a measure without Power BI Desktop (Premium)
value.excerpt: Need to add a measure to your Power BI dataset? Can't download it back in Power BI Desktop? Patrick shows you how you can still add that measure even though you can't use Power BI Desktop!  Tabular Editor 2 https://github.com/TabularEditor/TabularEditor  Tabular Editor 3 https://tabulareditor.com/  ðŸ“¢

value.title: Another Power BI optimization tool - Report Analyzer
value.excerpt: Already optimized your data model and still having some performance issues in Power BI? Check out Michael Kovalsky's Report Analyzer tool to inspect your report. value.title: Are you following best practices with Azure Synapse Analytics?

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  ðŸ“¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Brand your Report Server
value.excerpt: I break down how to make a branding package for SQL Server Reporting Services 2016. value.title: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth
value.excerpt: Connect from Power BI Mobile to SSRS using OAuth  In this video, I show you how to configure Active Directory Federated Services (ADFS) and the Web Application Proxy (WAP) role, in Windows 2016, so that you can connect from Power BI mobile to SQL Server Reporting Services using OAuth.
